definition: a connection between an electrical device and a large conducting body, such as the earth (which is taken to be at zero voltage), connect to the earth
details:
noun
- a connection between an electrical device and a large conducting body, such as the earth (which is taken to be at zero voltage)
= synonyms: ground
- the concerns of this life as distinguished from heaven and the afterlife
= synonyms: world
- the abode of mortals (as contrasted with Heaven or Hell)
= example: the abode of mortals (as contrasted with Heaven or Hell)
- the 3rd planet from the sun
= synonyms: world
- the solid part of the earth's surface
= synonyms: land
- the loose soft material that makes up a large part of the land surface
= example: the loose soft material that makes up a large part of the land surface
= synonyms: ground
- once thought to be one of four elements composing the universe (Empedocles)
= synonyms: air
verb
- connect to the earth
= example: connect to the earth
- hide in the earth like a hunted animal
